div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 751 Gorno Novo selo, c. 55 km. B of Plovdiv, Bulgaria, 1961 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 372 AR. Pot hoard Thracian Chersonese: 285 hemidr. Apollonia Pontica: 3 diob. Parium: 84 hemidr. Disposition: Stara Zagora Gerasimov, BIAB 26 (1963), p. 262 â€ Nikolov, Arkheologiia V.4 (1963), p. 41
